title: Introduction to Swift
abstract:
Swift is a cross platform open source functional language beloved by thousands of developers worldwide. It is known for its simplicity and flexibility, and hence is an extremely powerful language to build mobile applications as well as micro services. It was released just 3 years ago and so far, has already made the Tiobe top 20.

In this session, I will introduce you to Swiftâ€™s syntax. I will explain how flexible and self-describing the language is. I will cover most common patterns and approaches. Moreover, I will also talk about some known gaps and challenges developers are facing in everyday development.
